name: Trading Route
description: Control the arteries of commerce, provide a trader with startup costs.

upgrades.name: Inexperienced Guard
upgrades.description: Hire a nobody to travel with the trader. Increases minimum gold returns.

upgrades.name: Faster Horses
upgrades.description: Purchase horses to shorten travel time. Shortens travel time.

upgrades.name: Study Carriage
upgrades.description: Better put together carriage means lower chance of breakdowns. Increases minimum gold return, max stockpile size, and shortens travel time.

upgrades.name: Capital Sales License
upgrades.description: Acquire the ability to sell goods within the Capital City's borders. Increases gold returns.

upgrades.name: Experienced Guards
upgrades.description: Hire quality guards. Increases minimum gold returns.

upgrades.name: Expand Caravan
upgrades.description: Expanding size of caravan means more of everything, but slows down the route. Increases gold returns, and max stockpile size

upgrades.name: Regulatory Capture
upgrades.description: Bribe a judge to enact regulations few will be able to comply with. Increases gold returns.

name: Remote Rest Stop
description: It's cheap and in the middle of no-where. Don't expect much foot traffic. But those rare few tired souls will be grateful for a quiet refuge from the beasts of the night.

upgrades.name: Install Signage
upgrades.description: Install signage along nearby roads. Increases gold returns.

upgrades.name: Alcohol License
upgrades.description: Alcohol often leads to heavy spenders. Increases maximum gold return.

upgrades.name: Luxury Rooms
upgrades.description: Nicer rooms means you can charge more. Increases minimum gold return.

upgrades.name: New Wing
upgrades.description: More rooms means more bodies at peak. Increases maximum gold return.

name: Village Inn
description: A vital haven for weary travelers and thirsty locals alike. On a good night, the air is filled with laughter, music, and the clinking of golden coins (and the potential broken table).

upgrades.name: Hire Pretty Tavern Girl
upgrades.description: Drunk men are simple creatures. Increases maximum gold returns.

upgrades.name: Hire Experienced Bartender
upgrades.description: Great bartenders keep the drinks flowing. Increases maximum gold return.

upgrades.name: Biergarten
upgrades.description: Expand land plot with outdoor area, some may get too rowdy, leading to minor fines. Decreases minimum gold return, increases maximum gold return.

upgrades.name: Hire Intimidating Bouncers
upgrades.description: Keeps the rowdy customers under control. Increases minimum gold return.

upgrades.name: 'Entertainment' Wing
upgrades.description: Use your imagination. Increases gold returns.

name: Spellbook Publisher
description: Magic drips from the quill in this establishment, as scribes imbued with arcane knowledge ink the pages of tomes that will guide the next generation of magi.

upgrades.name: Undo-able Inkâ„¢
upgrades.description: It's trademarked and highway robbery, but it works. Increases minimum gold return.

upgrades.name: Enchanted Quills
upgrades.description: Quills need not be held, only spoken to. Decreases publishing time.

upgrades.name: Exclusivity Contracts
upgrades.description: Lock down the best talent. Increases gold returns.

name: Iron Mine
description: Deep in the earth, the rhythmic beat of picks against stone echoes out as miners unearth veins of precious iron, indispensable for smiths and warriors.

upgrades.name: Steel Tools
upgrades.description: Invest in steel tools to increase workers' efficiency. Increases gold returns.

upgrades.name: Cart System
upgrades.description: Install a cart system for more efficient transport of ore. Increases gold returns and max stockpile size.

upgrades.name: Miner's Training
upgrades.description: Provide advanced training for miners to improve their work. Increases minimum gold returns.

upgrades.name: Improved Mining Techniques
upgrades.description: Adopt and implement breakthrough mining techniques. Increases gold returns.

upgrades.name: Ward Against Cave-Ins
upgrades.description: Enchant the mine with magic wards to prevent cave-ins. Increases gold returns and shortens ore extraction time.

upgrades.name: Indentured Servitude
upgrades.description: Bribe nearby city officials for access to their criminal population, its a win-win if you don't consider morality, but that's what the gold is for. Increases gold returns

name: Monster Breeding Ranch
description: Here, creatures of nightmare and wonder are reared. Some are bred for their power in battle, others for exotic pets. All fetch a fair price on the market.

name: Crystal Mine
description: Beneath ominous stone outcroppings, miners burrow, discovering veins of shimmering crystal. Their glow is mesmerizing, their magical potential, immense.

name: Artifact Excavation Site
description: Hidden beneath the millennia of earth lie ancient artifacts infused with forgotten magics. Each find promises wealth, power, and a chance to rewrite history.

name: Magic Academy
description: A hum of power encircles these halls, where young apprentices learn to harness the arcane. Its influence spreads as mastering graduates shape the world.
